sentences.en: A hiker takes in the view from the trail to King’s Throne in Yukon’s Kluane National Park and Reserve.
sentences.cn: 加拿大育空地区的克卢恩国家公园和保护区里，一个徒步旅行者在观看去"国王宝座"的路径。

sentences.en: A hiker was killed by lightning in Tuen Mun.
sentences.cn: 一名行山人士在屯门遭受雷殛.

sentences.en: A missing hiker in Oregon has been found alive.
sentences.cn: 在俄勒冈州失踪的一名远足者被发现还活着.

sentences.en: A pocket knife is a handy tool for any camper or hiker.
sentences.cn: 口袋型的刀子是喜欢野营和健行的人一项便利的工具.

sentences.en: A water purification kit or hiker's filter system.
sentences.cn: 一包或山净水的过滤系统.

sentences.en: Foreign back - packer: It means a hiker who loves traveling around the world.
sentences.cn: 外国背包客: 就是喜欢在全世界旅游的徒步旅行者啊!

sentences.en: He picked up a hitch - hiker.
sentences.cn: 他中途让个搭便车的人上了车.

sentences.en: Hiker Park offers its best rewards to the strong - legged and self - sufficient traveller.
sentences.cn: 海克公园对脚力好、自信 自立 的旅游者来说是最有收获的地方.

sentences.en: Im a hiker that climbs to look, not conquer.
sentences.cn: 即时通讯远足登山说,看, 而不是征服.

sentences.en: People enjoy somewhat to be excited. So we chose a hiker not a touring party.
sentences.cn: 人多少有点自虐倾向,我们选择背包而行而不是旅行社罐装的旅游也是一样的道理.

sentences.en: Probably just a hiker or a bird-watcher, Jesse figured, that or some punk looking to poach someone's marijuana, not knowing the ginseng was worth even more.
sentences.cn: 也许只是一个徒步旅行者或者观鸟人，杰希推测到。 或许是一些小流氓想要偷一些别人的大麻，而不知道人参要更值钱。

sentences.en: Remember: if you're to rescue yourself, you'll also be able to help another hiker, too.
sentences.cn: 请记住: 如果你已准备好自救, 你同时也具备了救助其他徒步者的能力.

sentences.en: The goat butted the hiker with his horns.
sentences.cn: 山羊用角顶那个徒步旅行者.

sentences.en: The hiker carried a pack on his back.
sentences.cn: 那徒步旅行者背着一包行李.

sentences.en: The hiker negociated the high mountain pass.
sentences.cn: 这名徒步旅行者成功地登上了高山隘口.

sentences.en: The Hitch Hiker's Guide to the Galaxy also mentions alcohol.
sentences.cn: HitchHiker的《银河系漫游指南》中也提到了酒.

sentences.en: The son of a retired marine, Bernard, from New Portland in rural Maine, was described as a devout Christian, an Iraq war veteran, a keen snowboarder and an avid hiker.
sentences.cn: 伯纳德是一名退休军人的儿子，来自缅因州的农村新波特兰市。 人们说他是虔诚的基督徒，伊战士兵，钟爱滑雪，喜欢徒步旅行。

sentences.en: The unfortunate hiker fell into a crevasse.
sentences.cn: 这个不幸的徒行者落进了裂口处.

trans.tran_en: someone who walks long distances in the mountains or country for pleasure
